phrases: Why did she have to glare at us like that?
Just because we are going on a trip does not mean we have done something wrong.
I think that is just her job.
Is this the plane we are taking?
I always dreamed about being a plane!
A Place Further Than the Universe
It means the plane has stabilized and you can walk around.
I did not realize this was your first time on a plane, Shirase!
I watched my mother fly out a number of times,
but I have never been on one myself.
I bet you have flown lots of times, right, Yuzu-chan?
Can I trade my celery for your sweet egg?
Why am I the only one who did not get any?
Um, turn off this data roaming thing...
I cannot believe you slept through all that.
We are taking the subway, so we will follow the MRT signs.
What do you mean, you forgot to change your money?
And to change all your money...
we are leaving in two days, you know.
You need to tell me this stuff in advance!
Well, we are right by the equator, after all.
Last time I came, I could have just died right then.
It took us forever just to get to the hotel...
Because you bought all that stuff!
We only have one day before we have to get on a plane to Fremantle.
We are betting on who has to sleep next to you, Kimari.
Kimari-san, why do not you just start out on the floor?
You will probably fall sooner or later anyway...
Because that is what you did during training!
I do not remember at all.
That is why it is a problem!
Hey, let us put our valuables in here before we head out!
We will get ready in our rooms and meet in the lobby in 30 minutes.
It is not as disappointing as I expected.
I would heard it was more disappointing!
I told you, they will not have any.
How do you even have room?
You want me to eat that?
You took out your passport when we went through customs, right?
It is over there, but you cannot go in unless you are a guest.
It is just an ordinary pool.
Though it does have a nice view...
Hey, w-was it a sexy bikini pin-up?!
Are you making fun of me?
It is a bit like the crossroads of the sea, is not it?
Then people leave here to go all over the world, huh?
It is kind of amazing, is not it?
In two days, we are leaving here.
But this view will remain the same, right?
We will go to Antarctica, and come back to Japan,
but boats will still come here every day,
and the city will be full of people...
Going to school, working their jobs, hanging out with their friends...
They will all keep living their lives...
It is the same in Japan.
They are probably having dinner right about now.
In places we have never seen, locations we have never been...
So many people are living so many kinds of lives.
Even though it is common sense.
But I know what you are getting at.
You are hiding something, are not you?
You are hiding something, are not you?
I am sure it will turn up.
It is so important, after all.
But then it would have come up after all this searching, right?
Without a passport, not only can you not leave the country,
you cannot go back to Japan, either.
Then, if it does not turn up...
Long ago, I did live in Japan!
Why would I still work in a convenience store over here?
Do not worry, do not worry!
We will work it out somehow.
I mean, there are lots of options...
Anyway, let us look it up.
you can get a new one printed at the embassy.
The shortest time is... half a day.
Then if we go tomorrow, we will make it in time!
But the embassy takes Sundays and holidays off.
work 24 hours a day, 365 days a year, without rest!
We will just have to wait for a plane two or three days later.
We will arrive later, but we will make it before the boat leaves.
Tomorrow, let us stop by the airport counter.
Are we going... to change our arrival date?
It may be the only option.
I mean... the members of the expedition are awfully strict about rules.
They might say maybe you should not come.
Why do not we email Kanae-san about it?
You mean, to tell her we will be late?
It seems like the best thing...
Hey... look, we depart in the morning in two days, right?
So we have a whole day to go.
After all, it might still turn up.
Either way, you three should head for Australia in two days.
I think I can work this out on my own.
So if I make it in time, I will come after you.
And if you do not make it in time?
I just go back to Japan, right?
I can pay my own fare.
I will tell Kimari and the others myself.
It is because I did not want to change flights, right?
that when things do not go the way I plan, I tend to get very annoyed.
Hey, you do not have to apologize, Shirase.
I am the one who lost my passport.
I am the one who should apologize.
That is not what this is!
I do not want to be a drag on you guys.
What if you are right, and you do not get to go to Antarctica because of this?
I never said I was not going.
I just have to email Kanae-san and explain the situation...
I would like to take a shower!
Shirase, I know you were trying to be considerate.
I just really hate that kind of thing.
I know that is how relationships work, but...
when people try to be considerate of me...
Like I cannot tell how they really feel anymore...
That is why I could not handle high school,
and wanted to be alone as much as possible.
At the end of the day, when I am with someone else,
things usually end up like this.
Ever since I came to high school, I have had this keep away aura running full blast.
I have never been good around people
This is what I am talking about.
I told you, I do not like people being considerate of me.
Shirase, you want to go to Antarctica more than anyone, right?
You have wanted to go forever, right?
It is okay to make that your priority!
That is what would make me feel best.
Why did you leave without me?
I thought you were sleeping in because you were under the weather!
Yuzuki-chan's asking if we can change our tickets right now!
Oh, you do not have to worry about that now.
We decided that you three would go without me.
You are the one being stubborn!
There is not another opening for these tickets for another month.
It is because we bought the cheapest tickets.
So you three should go tomorrow.
I will get my passport reprinted myself, and
Why are you being so stubborn?
What is wrong with being stubborn?
That is how I have always lived my life!
I am stubborn, people make fun of me, and I have had awful experiences.
If you do not want me to be considerate, I will say it outright.
I do not want to be the kind of idiot who does not worry about something
just because you say do not worry about it!
I do not want the kind of shallow relationship where I go without you
because you say just go without me!
I do not want to be the kind of coward who gives up without trying,
even though we said we would all go together!
We are going, the four of us!
But it seems like a good thing.
You did not have to go that far!
There were not any other openings.
I did not have a choice.
Now I do not want you losing them, so hand them over.
Why are you acting so smug?
You hate it when people act considerate of you, right?
So let us pretend I am not.
Anyway, we are all going together now.
So tomorrow, we will go to the embassy and...
It is dangerous to just carry it around.
Shirase-chan, I brought Hainanese chicken rice and kaya toast!
You are hiding something, are not you?
You are hiding something, are not you?
W-We really have to do it?
Be glad that is all we are making you do.
Do not you realize how worried we were?
But we were able to cancel the tickets...
And we still get to fly out the same day.
It is neatly divided into four, but...
Why do not we play rock-paper-scissors to decide...
Who the hell called this the king of fruits?!
But I might like it once I get used to it...
